items.title: Caterpillar (CAT) Rises As Market Takes a Dip: Key Facts
items.description: In the latest trading session, Caterpillar (CAT) closed at $363.14, marking a +1.27% move from the previous day.

items.title: Caterpillar Inc. Increases Dividend
items.description: The Board of Directors of Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE: CAT) voted today to raise the quarterly dividend by 10 cents, a seven percent increase, to one dollar and fifty-one cents ($1.51) per share of common stock, payable Aug. 20 to shareholders of record at close of business July 21. Caterpillar expects to continue to return substantially all Machinery, Energy & Transportation (ME&T) free cash flow to shareholders over time through dividends and share repurchases.

items.title: Caterpillar Increases Dividend by 7.1%
items.description: By Connor Hart Caterpillar raised its quarterly dividend to $1.51 a share from $1.41. The new payout, equal to $6.04 a share, represents an annual yield of about 1.7% based on Tuesday's...
